DOC.brief_summary: This study include four project aim improve quality safety pediatric care implementation four clinical decision support service electronic health record ( EHR ) . The four project measure effect clinical decision support feature include : weight-based dosing ; smart form chronic condition ; guideline reminder ; result manager track abnormal lab result follow-up . Hypothesis : Implementation clinical decision support feature decrease medication error adverse drug event , assist physician adhere clinical practice guideline protocol certain chronic illness , improve physician follow-up abnormal lab result , overall improve safety quality pediatric clinical practice .
